column4: hey all...i seriously messed up my machine when i messed with /etc/fstab...now i cant load in X, and my file system is read only, so i cant change it back now...what do i do?
kix there is a backup...but i cant save it to overwrite
now instead of ripping on me, can i fix it?
If it's really shot, try editing fstab from a liveCD
You need to mount your hard drive to edit files on it.
so i want to mount sda1 what is that command?
Depends. Try sudo mkdir /media/hda1 and mount there?
i cant get it to mount
Oh... did I give you the mount command backwards?
